original_text: for the Amalekites and the Canaanites will face you there. Because you have turned away from the Lord, he will not be with you and you will fall by the sword.”
korean_text: 아말렉인과 가나안인이 너희 앞에 있으니 너희가 그 칼에 망하리라 너희가 여호와를 배반하였으니 여호와께서 너희와 함께 하지 아니하시리라 하나

sentences.original_text: for the Amalekites and the Canaanites
Because you have turned away from the Lord
he will not be with you
and you will fall by the sword
